newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla fed cattle market not tested - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla fed cattle market not tested - USDA.

text.p: Trade at a standstill in the Panhandle area Monday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers not tested. Feedlots reporting light inquiry from buyers.
No sales reported on slaughter steers or heifers; 3,000 head confirmed for the week to date.

The last established market was a light test of Friday at $68.00 per cwt. Bids Monday were mostly at $67.00 with some salesman asking $70.00, while others were uncommitted. Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink. Confirmed - None
